trans-unit.source: Represents an individual row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示個別資料列中的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRow class is used represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GridViewRow 類別代表個別的資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a designated row type using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項具有指定之資料列型別使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的資料列型別。

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`EmptyDataRow`|The empty row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: |資料列型別 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的資料列。 | |`EmptyDataRow`|中的空白資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The empty row is displayed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has no records to display and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> template is not `null`.| |`Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Separator`|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| To determine the row type of a GridViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項以顯示任何記錄，且<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>範本並不會`null`。 | |`Footer`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的頁尾資料列。 | |`Header`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的標頭資料列。 | |`Pager`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的頁面巡覽區資料列。 | |`Separator`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的分隔符號。 | 若要判斷 GridViewRow 物件的資料列類型，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: GridViewRow 物件也會有與它相關聯的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 狀態可以是下表中的值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|The GridViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Edit`|The GridViewRow object is in edit mode.| |`Normal`|The GridViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| |`Selected`|The GridViewRow object is selected.| To determine the state of a GridViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |狀態值 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|GridViewRow 物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的替代資料列。 | |`Edit`|GridViewRow 物件處於編輯模式。 | |`Normal`|GridViewRow 物件處於其標準 （預設值）。 | |`Selected`|選取 GridViewRow 物件。 | 若要判斷 GridViewRow 物件的狀態，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores all of its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項儲存它的資料列中的所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a GridViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷 GridViewRow 物件中的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the properties of the underlying data object that is bound to the GridViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取基礎繫結至 GridViewRow 物件使用的資料物件的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>屬性時，可使用只在下列期間之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the data object in the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷基礎資料來源中的資料物件的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the GridViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來存取個別 GridViewRow 物件的儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains other controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格包含其他控制項，您可以使用從儲存格擷取控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>儲存格的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法來尋找控制項，如果控制項的儲存格的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>欄位資料行或自動產生的欄位資料行，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的欄位值從其他位置的欄位值繫結至控制項的欄位資料行類型，先擷取控制項從適當的資料格，然後存取控制項的適當的屬性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 便可使用資料繫結運算式中直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>沒有繫結至控制項的屬性的值的欄位資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將欄位值會自動放入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的欄位值，您必須先擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制項從適當的資料格，然後使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewRow, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 GridViewRow 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `dataItemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value of the `rowState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value of the `rowType` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>|值`dataItemIndex`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|值`rowIndex`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>|值`rowState`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>|值`rowType`參數。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>在基礎<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying data object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎資料物件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件繫結。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to access the properties of the underlying data object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的基礎資料物件的屬性使用 DataItem 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The DataItem property is only available during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 期間和之後，才可以使用 DataItem 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the underlying data object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，這表示基礎資料物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件繫結。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>在基礎<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> in the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 用於判斷索引的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>基礎<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> DataItemIndex 屬性

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>基礎資料來源中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要在事件頁面的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已取消。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 屬性用於判斷索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property to determine the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性來判斷狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table: |Status value|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is selected.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個狀態可以是下表中的值的位元組合: |狀態值 |描述 | |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的替代資料列。 | |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件處於編輯模式。 | |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件處於其標準 （預設值）。 | |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件。 | 這個屬性通常用來判斷執行作業之前的資料列的狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列型別<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料列型別屬性，來判斷類型的資料列，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件表示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row type values using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出使用不同的資料列型別值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: |資料列型別 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的頁尾資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的標頭資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|中的空白資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty row is displayed when <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control does not have any records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項沒有任何要顯示的記錄時，會顯示空白資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的頁面巡覽區資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項中的分隔符號。 | 這個屬性通常用來判斷執行作業之前的資料列的類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>
